titleStmt.title: Letter from Jesusita Baros Torres to Santos Baros Schubert, August 20, 1958
Carta de Jesusita Baros Torres a Santos Baros Schubert, 20 de agosto, 1958
titleStmt.author: Baros Torres, Jesusita

publicationStmt.authority: Family Letters: An analysis of the Personal Correspondence of a Mexican American Family in Western Colorado and Eastern Nebraska in the First Half of the 20th Century

distributor.name: Department of Modern Languages and Literatures

bibl.author: Baros Torres, Jesusita
bibl.title: Letter from Jesusita Baros Torres to Santos Baros Schubert

correspContext.ref: Letter from x to y, date
Letter from x to y, date

div1.p: la precente es para saludarte tanto á tí como al los muchachos y al Bill nosotros estamos bien Gracías á Dios

pues mucho gusto recive con tu carta on beo que llegaron bíen es por lo que le doy Gracías á Díos, que dijo el Bill del cheke del Billy boy, yo siempre me acuerdo que me ayudaba á llebarle el lonche al grandpa,

Me dise la Kethy que le dígas al Billy que los gatitos estan muy grandes y estan en el gallinero la gata se los llevo pal gallinero la Kethy me dijo y iban para Dever y abersí hayaban un phonograph para comprarselos á los muchachos bueno pues muchos recuerdos de la Helen y de Jesus y el Jerry trabajando en el pepino Kethy dise de que quiere ir para ya pero como ya mero
es la escuela pueda que sea para hotro año

closer.salute: bueno esto sera todo por esta ves siempre en cada y cuando me escrbes muchos recuerdos para todos max y de tu mama que les deseo bien en todo

postscript.p: ya tenemos el correo en la casa;

div1.p: this letter is to greet you and the kids and Bill. We are well, thank God.

Well, I was happy to receive your letter where I read that you got there all right, for which I thank God. What did Bill say about the check for Billy boy? I always remember how he used to help me take lunch to grandpa.

Kathy asks that you tell Billy that the kittens are very big and are in the henhouse. The cat mother, female cat moved them to the henhouse. Kathy told me they are going planning to go to Denver to look for a phonograph, to buy it for the kids. Well, many regards much love from Helen and Jesus. Jerry is working on the cucumber fields Kathy wants to go there to visit you but since it’s almost
time to start school it may be until next year.

closer.salute: Well, this will be all for now. Write to me once in a while. Many regards Warm regards to all from Max and from your mom, who wishes you well in everything

postscript.p: We now have mail delivery at home
